custom-attributes.custom-attribute:
<style type='text/css'>
        .embeddedServiceHelpButton .helpButton .uiButton {
        background-color: #CC0000;
        font-family: "Salesforce Sans", sans-serif;
        }
        .embeddedServiceHelpButton .helpButton .uiButton:focus {
        outline: 1px solid #CC0000;
        }
        @font-face {
        font-family: 'Salesforce Sans';
        src: url('https://www.sfdcstatic.com/system/shared/common/assets/fonts/SalesforceSans/SalesforceSans-Regular.woff') format('woff'),
        url('https://www.sfdcstatic.com/system/shared/common/assets/fonts/SalesforceSans/SalesforceSans-Regular.ttf') format('truetype');
        }
        </style>
        
        <script type='text/javascript' src='https://service.force.com/embeddedservice/5.0/esw.min.js'></script>
        <script type='text/javascript'>
        var initESW = function(gslbBaseURL) {
        embedded_svc.settings.displayHelpButton = true; //Or false
        embedded_svc.settings.language = ''; //For example, enter 'en' or 'en-US'
        
        embedded_svc.settings.defaultMinimizedText = 'CHAT WITH US'; //(Defaults to Chat with an Expert)
        //embedded_svc.settings.disabledMinimizedText = '...'; //(Defaults to Agent Offline)
        
        //embedded_svc.settings.loadingText = ''; //(Defaults to Loading)
        //embedded_svc.settings.storageDomain = 'yourdomain.com'; //(Sets the domain for your deployment so that visitors can navigate subdomains during a chat session)
        
        // Settings for Chat
        //embedded_svc.settings.directToButtonRouting = function(prechatFormData) {
        // Dynamically changes the button ID based on what the visitor enters in the pre-chat form.
        // Returns a valid button ID.
        //};
        //embedded_svc.settings.prepopulatedPrechatFields = {}; //Sets the auto-population of pre-chat form fields
        //embedded_svc.settings.fallbackRouting = []; //An array of button IDs, user IDs, or userId_buttonId
        //embedded_svc.settings.offlineSupportMinimizedText = '...'; //(Defaults to Contact Us)
        
        embedded_svc.settings.enabledFeatures = ['LiveAgent'];
        embedded_svc.settings.entryFeature = 'LiveAgent';
        
        //the snippet of code below does 3 things: matches to salesforce contacts exactly on email, creates a new contact if no match found, and links the chat to the matched or created contact
        
        embedded_svc.settings.extraPrechatInfo = [{
        "entityFieldMaps": [{
        "doCreate": true,
        "doFind": false,
        "fieldName": "LastName",
        "isExactMatch": false,
        "label": "Last Name"
        }, {
        "doCreate": true,
        "doFind": false,
        "fieldName": "FirstName",
        "isExactMatch": false,
        "label": "First Name"
        }, {
        "doCreate": true,
        "doFind": true,
        "fieldName": "Email",
        "isExactMatch": true,
        "label": "Email"
        }],
        "entityName": "Contact",
        "saveToTranscript": "Contact",
        "showOnCreate": true
        }];
        //the snippet below leverages a custom label to set the brand logo on the survey page
        embedded_svc.settings.extraPrechatFormDetails = [
        {label: 'brandLogo', value: 'TROY_RED.png', displayToAgent: false
        }];
        embedded_svc.settings.autoOpenPostChat = true;
        
        //the urls for salesforce, gslbBaseUrl, baseLiveAgentContactURL, DeploymentId, buttonId, baseLiveAgentURL, eswLiveAgentDevName all change in different salesforce environments. When an embedded service is generated from the target environment these are populated automatically
        
        embedded_svc.init(
        'https://mtdproducts--UAT.cs37.my.salesforce.com',
        'https://uat-mtd.cs37.force.com/TroyBilt',
        gslbBaseURL,
        '00D2i0000000Mmd',
        'TroyBilt_Chat',
        {
        baseLiveAgentContentURL: 'https://c.la3-c1cs-ph2.salesforceliveagent.com/content',
        deploymentId: '5722G000000blJi',
        buttonId: '573A0000000TNuc',
        baseLiveAgentURL: 'https://d.la3-c1cs-ph2.salesforceliveagent.com/chat',
        eswLiveAgentDevName: 'EmbeddedServiceLiveAgent_Parent04I2i0000004CEcEAM_16e046843a6',
        isOfflineSupportEnabled: false
        }
        );
        };
        
        if (!window.embedded_svc) {
        var s = document.createElement('script');
        s.setAttribute('src', 'https://mtdproducts--UAT.cs37.my.salesforce.com/embeddedservice/5.0/esw.min.js');
        s.onload = function() {
        initESW(null);
        };
        document.body.appendChild(s);
        } else {
        initESW('https://service.force.com');
        }
        </script>

content.display-name: Product Line Browse - Features Cards - Troybilt Sample
content.description: This is the feature cards asset for sample on the product line browse page.

custom-attributes.custom-attribute:
Explore Lawn & Garden Tractors

Our riding lawn mowers are designed to give you unmatched strength and durability, and they’re packed with performance features you’ll appreciate. 

One stacked deck.

Experience a cutting system that features stamped and fabricated options built with the best materials to ensure a consistent quality cut every time. 

A machine that works smarter.

The new Cub Cadet electronic fuel injection (EFI) technology boasts serious strength that decreases fuel use by up to 25% and decreases the time spent on maintenance.  

Total comfort. Mow after mow.

Each XT Enduro Series™ lawn tractor is built for comfort, with adjustable seating, comfort-grip steering and overall ergonomics designed for the rider. 

Exceptional corrosion protection.

Only Cub Cadet offers automotive-grade corrosion resistance to protect against wear and tear.  

Responsive handling.

The XT Enduro Series steering system delivers optimized command and control at every turn. 

Peace of mind.

The XT Enduro series has a warranty as strong as the machines – a 3-year unlimited-hours warranty, plus more.

content.display-name: Sample Troy Bilt Product Line Lifestlye Banner Landing
content.description: Group of product line sub-categories with heading

custom-attributes.custom-attribute:
Show Lawn Mowers

Riding Lawn Tractors

Troy-Bilt速 offers a full line of riding lawn mowers and garden tractors to help you manage large yards and tackle other chores with a range of attachments. Our riding mowers offer a variety of transmission options, including Shift-on-the-Go速 & hydrostatic.

Shop Riding Lawn Tractors

Zero-Turn Mowers

Zero-turn mowers are controlled by two lap bars or a steering wheel that independently controls the speed and direction of the rear wheels. When choosing a mower, the bigger your yard is, the bigger the mower deck size.

Shop Zero-Turn Mowers

Walk-Behind Mowers

Troy-Bilt速 offers a full line of push and self-propelled, walk-behind lawn mowers to maintain lawns of many shapes and sizes. All walk-behind mowers come with helpful features like the TriAction速 cutting system and many more.

Shop Walk-Behind Mowers

content.description: Group of product line sub-categories with heading

custom-attributes.custom-attribute:
Shop Lawn Mowers

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Phasellus dignissim mauris id efficitur fermentum. Vivamus vel porta neque. Proin vulputate pretium sapien, eget faucibus turpis.

Riding Lawn Mowers

Power & Precision for the Bigger Challenges

Built in America since ‘61 and backed by the industry’s strongest warranty, Cub Cadet® lawn and garden tractors all come standard with the strongest cutting systems for mowing performance, refined ergonomics designed around you and an array of attachments and accessories for year-round versatility and utility. 

Shop Riding Lawn Mowers

Zero-Turn Mowers

A Strong Experience at Every Turn

Designed with strength, comfort and the ability to get the job done 50% faster than riding tractors, each Cub Cadet zero-turn riding mower is engineered to handle a range of terrain and cover up to 5 acres, with steering wheel options that increase ease.

Shop Zero-Turn Mowers

Walk-Behind Mowers

Zero Gasoline, Zero Emissions

We took the proven strength and performance of our gas-powered machines and combined them with a powerful and convenient lithium-ion battery to create electric lawn mowers with no power fade and reduced noise for a more enjoyable ride.

Shop Walk-Behind Mowers
